channel.title: Compiler Error :(
channel.description:
When i try compiling it says:
[code]client.java:10242: illegal start of expression public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Does anyone know why its an illegal start of expression? I tryed messing about with it but found nothing. Thanks :)

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
	if (amount > 0) {
		if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){
			if (!takeAsNote) {
				if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) {
					if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) {
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) {
							bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount;
							resetBank();
							resetItems(5064);[/code]

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
	if (amount > 0) {
		if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){
			if (!takeAsNote) {
				if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) {
					if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) {
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) {
							bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount;
							resetBank();
							resetItems(5064);
						}
					} else {
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),bankItemsN[fromSlot])) {
							bankItems[fromSlot] = 0;
							bankItemsN[fromSlot] = 0;
							resetBank();
							resetItems(5064);[/code]
